titles.title: All People That On Earth do Dwell

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
v2
v3
verse.lines: O enter then His gates with praise, approach with joy His courts unto; praise, laud, and bless His name always, for it is seemly so to do.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Because the LORD our God is good, His mercy is forever sure; His truth at all times firmly stood and shall from age to age endure.

verse.name: v5
